All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CarNotFoundException
The CarNotFoundException class represents an exception thrown when a requested car is not found in the system.
CarService
The CarService class provides methods to interact with the car repository and perform operations related to cars in the car rental system.
Customer
The Customer class represents a customer in a car rental system.
CustomerNotFoundException
The CustomerNotFoundException class represents an exception thrown when a requested customer is not found in the system.
CustomerService
The CustomerService class provides methods to interact with the customer repository and perform operations related to customers in the car rental system.
DBConnection
Utility class for managing database connections.
ExceptionTest
ExceptionTest class provides test cases for handling exceptions in the Car Rental System application.
FindLeaseByIDTest
FindLeaseByIDTest class provides test cases for finding a lease by ID in the Car Rental System application.
ICarLeaseRepository
The ICarLeaseRepository interface defines methods for interacting with the car rental system's data repository.
ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl
This class implements the ICarLeaseRepository interface to provide methods for managing car rental operations in the database.
ICarService
The ICarService interface defines the contract for car-related operations in the Car Rental System.
ICustomerService
The ICustomerService interface defines the contract for customer-related operations in the Car Rental System.
ILeaseService
The ILeaseService interface defines the contract for lease-related operations in the Car Rental System.
IPaymentService
The IPaymentService interface defines the contract for payment-related operations in the Car Rental System.
Lease
The Lease class represents a lease in a car rental system.
LeaseNotFoundException
The LeaseNotFoundException class represents an exception thrown when a requested lease is not found in the system.
LeaseService
The LeaseService class provides methods to interact with the lease repository and perform operations related to leases in the car rental system.
LeaseTest
LeaseTest class provides test cases for creating a lease in the Car Rental System application.
MainModule
MainModule class provides the main functionality and user interface of the Car Rental System application.
Payment
The Payment class represents a payment made in a car rental system.
PaymentService
PaymentService class provides methods to handle payment-related operations in the Car Rental System.
Vehicle
The Vehicle class represents a vehicle in a car rental system.
VehicleTest
VehicleTest class provides test cases for adding a new vehicle in the Car Rental System application.
